reference.title: line-through
reference.shortdesc: The line-through (<line-through>) element is used to apply a line through (strikethrough) to the content of the element. This element is part of the DITA highlighting domain. Use this element only when a more semantically appropriate element is not available. This element is intended for authors to indicate a deletion or revision for rhetorical purpose. It is not intended to be used for indicating revisions or changes made as a side effect of authoring activity.
